rows.Description: Box + 3 sachets fanned + glass of water with minerals dissolving
rows.Styling Notes: Clean white/light gray background. Natural light. Water should show slight mineral tint.

rows.Description: Person pouring sachet into water, kitchen counter, morning light
rows.Styling Notes: Minimal clutter. Premium kitchen. Subject in athleisure. Calm, intentional moment.

rows.Description: Sachet + shaker bottle in gym bag context
rows.Styling Notes: Clean gym bag, towel, earbuds. Not sweaty/gross. Aspirational.

rows.Description: Sachet on desk next to laptop and water glass
rows.Styling Notes: Clean desk setup. Professional but not corporate. Plant, nice lighting.

rows.Description: Box + sachets + ingredients (sea salt crystals, ocean water vial)
rows.Styling Notes: Organized grid layout. Ingredients as props. Scientific but approachable.

rows.Description: Close-up of powder pouring from sachet into water
rows.Styling Notes: Macro lens. Capture the dissolve moment. Dynamic but clean.

rows.Description: Box at angle showing front + side
rows.Styling Notes: Subtle shadow. Premium product feel. Show key claims visible.
Show full label legibility. Clean background.

rows.Description: Sachet in hand for size reference
rows.Styling Notes: Clean hand, natural pose. Show portability.
Deep blue, pristine, depth feeling. Not tropical/vacation.

rows.Description: Split image: cluttered supplements vs single IonWave box
